# Voice Soundboard

> AI-powered voice synthesis with natural language control for AI assistants

## Overview

Voice Soundboard gives AI agents expressive, human-like voices with 54+ voices, 19 emotions, real-time streaming, voice cloning, and multi-speaker dialogue. Control speech style with natural language like "warmly and cheerfully".

## Quick Start

```bash
pip install voice-soundboard

# Download models
mkdir models && cd models
curl -LO https://github.com/thewh1teagle/kokoro-onnx/releases/download/model-files-v1.0/kokoro-v1.0.onnx
curl -LO https://github.com/thewh1teagle/kokoro-onnx/releases/download/model-files-v1.0/voices-v1.0.bin
```

```python
from voice_soundboard import VoiceEngine, play_audio

engine = VoiceEngine()
result = engine.speak("Hello!", style="warmly and cheerfully")
play_audio(result.audio_path)
```

## Installation Extras

| Extra | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `[websocket]` | WebSocket server |
| `[web]` | Mobile web UI |
| `[mcp]` | MCP server (40+ tools) |
| `[chatterbox]` | Paralinguistic tags, 23 languages |
| `[f5tts]` | F5-TTS DiT voice cloning |
| `[all]` | Everything |

## Core API

### engine.speak(text, **kwargs)
Generate speech from text.
- `text`: Text to speak
- `style`: Natural language style ("warmly", "excitedly", "like a narrator")
- `voice`: Voice ID (54+ options)
- `emotion`: Emotion preset (19 options)
- Returns: AudioResult with path and metadata

### engine.speak_dialogue(script, **kwargs)
Generate multi-speaker dialogue.
- `script`: Script with speaker tags `[S1:alice]`, `[S2:bob]`
- `voices`: Optional voice assignments
- Returns: Combined audio file

### engine.clone_voice(audio_path, voice_id)
Clone a voice from reference audio (3-10 seconds).
- `audio_path`: Reference audio file
- `voice_id`: ID for the cloned voice
- Returns: Voice profile

### engine.speak_realtime(text, **kwargs)
Stream speech with real-time playback (<100ms latency).

## Features

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **54+ Voices** | American, British, Japanese, Mandarin accents |
| **19 Emotions** | happy, sad, angry, excited, calm, and more |
| **Paralinguistic Tags** | `[laugh]`, `[sigh]`, `[gasp]` - natural sounds |
| **23 Languages** | AR, DA, DE, EN, ES, FI, FR, and more |
| **Voice Cloning** | Clone from 3-10 seconds of audio |
| **F5-TTS** | DiT-based zero-shot cloning |
| **Real-time Streaming** | Sub-100ms latency |
| **MCP Integration** | 40+ tools for AI agents |

## MCP Server

Add to `claude_desktop_config.json`:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "voice-soundboard": {
      "command": "python",
      "args": ["-m", "voice_soundboard.mcp"]
    }
  }
}
```
